page.title: 16A GOOLE CHILD'S DAY STARTS
page.content:
On a weekday morning,I am awakened by the noise blaring from my clock radio at 7.15. When I have washed and dressed I pack my school bag - and often forget something - before going downstairs. While my mother is preparing breakfast,I watch the early morning television programmes. After eating breakfast I have a paper round to do which takes about twenty five minutes. Often, with very little time to spare, I then have to rush home,grab my bag and leave for school. Weekends are much more relaxed and I stay in bed much longer to make up for all the sleep lost during the week !
by Lisa Clarkson (aged 13)
